alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 7:49PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gillespie County through 830 PM CDT... At 749 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Doss, or 19 miles south of Mason. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherry Spring and Doss. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Texas.
